name: Puppy Foster Sim
description: Puppy Foster is a simulation style prototype created for a university assignment in 2020. You have been entrusted to foster a cute little puppy. Now you must take care of it, keeping it fed, watered and happy. Don’t let any of its stats fall below 0 or your foster status will be revoked and the puppy will be taken from you! As a concept, the sim has no end as yet, unless your puppy gets taken away.
